messages.bc:
Enter {} you want to broadcast:

Use /cancel to cancel operation.
messages.bc_help:
How to use broadcast types

👉 text - Send written text broadcast to all users
👉 photo - Send a photo with/without caption as broadcast.
👉 video - Send a video clip (must be less than 50mb) as broadcast with/without caption
👉 animation - Send short animated gif as broadcast with/without caption.

Use /cancel to cancel operation.
messages.birthday_prompt:
Hi {}🥰

We noticed you have not responded to this message🥺

As a part of the CCI family, we would like to celebrate you on your special day. 🥳

Please take a second to tell us when your birthday comes up.
messages.birthday_confirm:
Thank you for replying this prompt🤗.
Your birthday has been set to {} (month/day)
messages.birthday_message1:
YAYYYY!!🥳
It's your special day {0}🎉

As you celebrate a new year, We pray that you abound in good health, joy and peace, and that your light shines brightly to all around you.🌟
We delight ourselves in the Lord for giving us the desires of our hearts in a friend such as you!🥰
It's your year of Impact!

Happy Birthday {0}❤️❤️

messages.get_sermon:
Enter the title of the sermon you wish to get.

Click /cancel to cancel operation.
messages.help:
Here's how the buttons below work

👉 latest sermon - This gives you the most recent sermon available on the [website](http://ccing.org/sermons/)

👉 get sermon - This helps you get a specific sermon by it's title. You can search using the exact title or a keyword.
Searching for a keyword (e.g Grace) would give you all sermon containing the keyword in their titles.

👉 devotional - Get today's devotional

👉 map - This helps you find the nearest MAP centre to your location.

👉 location - Gives you the address of the nearest CCI branch to you.

👉 membership - Register for CCI membership class.

Other commands
• /mute - Mute notifications
• /unmute - Unmute notifications

messages.mute:
You have muted notifications from CCI Bot 😞

You won't receive broadcasts from the bot henceforth.

Use /unmute to unmute notifications.

messages.start:
Hi {}🤗

I am your personal CCI assistant.
I am here to aid you in experiencing progress and joy in the faith🥳💃
I can help you with a lot of things!
Below are some of them

• Daily Devotionals 📰
• Latest Sermons 🎶
• Find a MAP location close to you! 
• Find a CCI branch close to you📍
• Register for Membership Class📝
• Get instant ticket notifications😱(Lagos branch Only)🔔
 and so much more...

I'm so excited to do this with you

To get started
All you have to do is click on the icon with four dots or just type “help”

All sermons and devotionals gotten from
[Triumph30](triumph30.org) and [Celebration Church International](ccing.org)
messages.temp_message:
New podcast episode is here🥳🥳

Why does the Bible have so many translations? Doesn’t it imply that Christians have more than one Bible?

Finding Salaam has yet released another podcast addressing this and related topics on the integrity of the Bible.

Kindly click any of the links to listen and ensure you share with your friends, family, everyone.
